oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Temple Church of God in Christ: fieldnotes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Temple Church of God in Christ
Fieldnotes on Temple Church of God in Christ. Notes document the location of the church and provide a brief sketch of the building.

Temple Church of God in Christ is a rural African American church in Parsons, Tennessee. The building contains an original section from 1960 and a rear addition dating to 1985. At the time of fieldwork, Joseph Fisher served as pastor. Since fieldwork was completed in 1998, a new worship center was constructed across the street from the older building.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African American Churches -- Tennessee
